scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf web/public/dist/js/* && rm -rf web/public/dist/css/*
scripts.build:css: cat web/public/dist/css/app.css assets/css/*.css | cleancss -o web/public/dist/css/agendav.css && cat assets/print-css/*.css | cleancss -o web/public/dist/css/agendav.print.css
scripts.prebuild:js: uglifyjs assets/js/core/*.js assets/js/other/*.js assets/js/app/*.js assets/templates/templates.js -b -o web/public/dist/js/agendav.js
scripts.build: npm run bower && npm run composer && npm run build:templates && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.dist-clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf bower_components && rm -rf .git && rm -rf ansible
scripts.dist: npm run bower && npm run composer && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run dist-clean
